title: Mazda3 | Choose Hatchback or Sedan

meta.name: description
meta.content: Design, technology, performance and safety. There are lots of reasons Mazda3 is the Car of Choice.

meta.name: og:description
meta.content: Design, technology, performance and safety. There are lots of reasons Mazda3 is the Car of Choice.

props.warningMessage:
Thanks for visiting. To enjoy our site please update your web browser.
At Mazda we want you to enjoy the best online experience possible. This means updating your web browser to the latest version.

props.name: Mazda BT-50
props.type: Single Cab | Freestyle Cab | Dual Cab

gtm.action: Nav - Clicked - MORE - "ABOUT MAZDA" - "IMAGINATION DRIVES US"
Nav - Clicked - MORE - "ABOUT MAZDA" - "BEYOND THE DRIVE"

props.heading: Choose your colour and body type
Choose Design that takes you places
props.content:
Mazda's signature KODO 'Soul of Motion' Design captures the power and grace of an animal leaping into motion. Striking from every angle, every curve and plane on Mazda3 is designed to evoke a sense of dynamic movement.

Discover more about KODO Design >

options.name: Black Cloth
options.disclaimer: Available in Mazda3 Neo Sport only.

options.name: Black Cloth
options.disclaimer: Available in Mazda3 Maxx Sport and SP25.

options.name: Black Leather
options.disclaimer: Available in Mazda3 Touring, SP25 GT and SP25 Astina (shown).

options.name: Pure White Leather
options.disclaimer: Available in Mazda3 Touring, SP25 GT and SP25 Astina (shown) with certain exterior colour.

props.heading: CHOOSE DRIVE-ENHANCING TECH
props.description: Integrated connectivity, or driver-assist technology? With Mazda3, you'll always feel part of the action wherever you go, thanks to a range of intuitive smarts and cutting-edge connectivity leading the way.

props.title: Active Driving Display
props.blurb:
Focused intelligence

The full colour Active Driving Display places your key information
such as speed, navigation and more in your line of sight.

*SP25 GT and SP25 Astina

props.title: MZD Connect
props.blurb:
Podcast, playlist or sat nav?

No matter what you choose MZD Connect has all your infotainment needs covered. The intuitive interface
makes it easy to find your way to your music, digital feeds, navigation and more.

*Sat Nav on Maxx Sport, Touring, SP25, SP25 GT and SP25 Astina

Learn more>

props.title: Dual Climate Control
props.blurb:
Choose your own temperature

Dual zone climate control offers both driver and passenger just the right temperature - even if it's not the same.

*Maxx Sport, Touring, SP25, SP25 GT and SP25 Astina

props.title: Traffic Sign Recognition (TSR)
props.blurb:
Always be in the know

Traffic Sign Recognition uses a forward sensing camera to detect speed limit, Stop and No Entry signs then projects this information onto your Active Driving Display so you don't miss a thing.

*SP25 GT and SP25 Astina

props.title: Electric Parking Brake
props.blurb:
Just one touch

Engaging and disengaging the Mazda3 parking brake is now
as easy as flicking a switch on its stylish and well-appointed centre console. 

*Maxx Sport, Touring, SP25, SP25 GT and SP25 Astina

props.title: Bose Premium Audio
props.blurb:
Tunes or Talkback?

Whatever you choose you'll enjoy crystal clear performance from the 231 watt
Bose digital amplifier via nine premium speakers located throughout the cabin.

*SP25 GT and SP25 Astina

props.title: Multi-function commander
props.blurb:
Choose elegant simplicity

Dial through menus and functions with the multi-function commander.
Conveniently located in the centre console it's designed for minimum distraction.

props.heading: Choose power with efficiency
props.content: Too often power is compromised in the pursuit of fuel economy. With Mazdas groundbreaking SKYACTIV TECHNOLOGY, the sporty performance of Mazda3s SKYACTIV-G engine is unleashed with maximum efficiency.

props.xmlString:
G-VECTORING CONTROL

Our newest technology, G-Vectoring Control advances ambience and driving comfort by finely controlling engine torque based on your steering and acceleration. This helps reduce driver fatigue and creates a smoother ride with better handling.

props.heading: CHOOSE ADVANCED PROTECTION
props.blurb: Mazda3 features advanced levels of safety for the ultimate in driving confidence. Enjoy the drive knowing youre being looked after with vigilant warning systems and responsive hazard protection, with more safety features than ever before now standard across the range.

props.heading: Adaptive LED Headlamps (ALH)
props.blurb:
ALH Individually controls a number of LEDs to broaden visibility at low speeds, avoid dazzling others on high beam and extend vision at highway speeds.
*SP25 Astina only

Learn more >

props.heading: Smart City Brake Support F/R (SCBS)
props.blurb:
Operating between 4-80km/h and with Pedestrian detection, SCBS monitors the vehicle in front to assess the likelihood of a collision. If there is a high risk, the system will warn you and brake automatically if needed.
*SCBS-F standard across the range, SCBS-R standard on Maxx Sport and above.

Learn more about SCBS-F and SCBS-R >

props.heading: Blind Spot Monitoring (BSM)
props.blurb:
By scanning external mirrors blind spots up to 50m behind your vehicle, radar detects unseen vehicles to alert you of potentially hazardous lane changes.
*Maxx Sport and above

Learn more >

props.heading: Rear Cross Traffic Alert (RCTA)
props.blurb:
RCTA assists you when reversing by warning if a car is approaching from either side.
*Maxx Sport and above

Learn more >

children.description: Small in size, big on lightweight versatility.
children.name: Hatch

children.description: Front Wheel Drive delivers all the lightweight agility you need for the city and beyond.
